About Me

I am a mathematician from Galicia (Spain), currently working at Ritsumeikan University in Kyoto, Japan. My Thesis advisor was Prof. Jesús Álvarez López (University of Santiago de Compostela) and my current Host Professor is Hiraku Nozawa.

My work intersects several different mathematical fields, such as:

  • dynamical systems,
  • foliated spaces,
  • graph theory,
  • Riemannian geometry,
  • hyperbolic geometry.
